hero.heading: 9th Island Outrigger Canoe Club
hero.description: Experience the spirit of Hawaiian outrigger canoe paddling in the heart of Las Vegas. Join our ohana and discover the tradition, fitness, and community of outrigger canoeing.

items.title: Community & Ohana
items.description: Join a welcoming family of paddlers who share a passion for outrigger canoeing and Hawaiian culture.

items.title: Training & Racing
items.description: Regular practices on beautiful desert lakes and opportunities to compete in regional races.

items.title: Cultural Connection
items.description: Experience and learn about Hawaiian traditions, values, and the spirit of aloha.

callToAction.heading: Ready to Paddle?
callToAction.description: Whether you're an experienced paddler or new to the sport, we'd love to have you join us on the water.
